description: Array A(x,y): Position of the totally balanced binary string obtained by concatenating the binary strings A014486(x) & A014486(y) in such a way that the latter is inserted after the least significant 1-bit of the former, followed by the remaining 0-bits, if any. Listed antidiagonalwise as A(0,0), A(1,0), A(0,1), A(2,0), A(1,1), A(0,2), ...
